“The Olympics in LA have historically been about showcasing the city—its climate, its landmarks, its culture—and situating its ambitions in a global context.”

“Shows like Big Brother and Top Chef remain more or less identical to how they began.”
“It has gone from being an average, competent reality-adventure show to a heavily serialized, reality-based workplace drama.”
